original_title: Zorgon: The H-Bomb Beast From Hell
overview: A reported monster is terrorizing a local community, but the police have no leads. A man who is fed up with the killings calls a handful of his friends and forms a posse to look for the creature. They head to Bronson Canyon to see if they can uncover who's behind all of these deaths.
title: Zorgon: The H-Bomb Beast From Hell
